```{r setup, include=FALSE}
  thematic::thematic_rmd(font = "auto")
```

## Themed Plots

When running this document with [`{thematic}`](https://rstudio.github.io/thematic/) installed, the `thematic::thematic_rmd(font = "auto")` effectively translates `theme` (CSS) settings to new global theming defaults for `{ggplot2}` and `{lattice}` graphics

### ggplot2

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) +
  geom_point() + geom_smooth()
```

### lattice

```{r}
lattice::show.settings()
```
